mapper.select:
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(WI.WI_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') WI_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(WI.WI_START,'%H%i%s'),'%T') WI_START, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(WI.WI_END,'%H%i%s'),'%T') WI_END ,WI.WI_ETC ,UI.UI_NAME ,UI.UI_ID ,DI.DI_NAME ,GI.GI_NAME FROM WORKING_INFO WI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON UI.UI_NUM = WI.UI_NUM INNER JOIN DEPART_INFO DI ON UI.DI_NUM = DI.DI_NUM INNER JOIN GRADE_INFO GI ON UI.GI_NUM = GI.GI_NUM
AND WI_DATE = #{wiDate}
AND UI.UI_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{uiId},'%')
AND UI.UI_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{uiName},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKING_INFO SET WI_ETC = TIMEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%s'),WI_START) ,WI_END = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i%s') WHERE WI_NUM = #{wiNum}
